specialAbilities.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
specialAbilities.description: The dragon exhales destructive energy in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 28 Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 (16d10) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

specialAbilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
specialAbilities.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

specialAbilities.name: Frightful Presence
specialAbilities.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +20 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d8 + 11) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +20 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 11) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +20 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d8 + 11) bludgeoning damage.

legendaryActions.name: Detect
legendaryActions.description: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendaryActions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 20 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 28 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendaryActions.name: Tail Attack
legendaryActions.description: The dragon makes a tail attack.
